General.Name: Ningbo Tuopu Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Ningbo Tuopu Group Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of auto parts in China and internationally. It offers NVH anti-vibration systems, including powertrain mounting systems, chassis bushings, rubber metal parts, torsional vibrational dampers, and aluminum die-casting products; headliners, pedal pads, clothes racks, and floor carpets for interior trims; spare wheel covers, side plaques, and interior trimming boards for trunk trims; interior trim materials; and sound, heat, and silencer insulation pads, as well as insulation lining od wheel housing. The company also provides body lightweight products comprising integrated casting parts, shock towers, torsion and longitudinal beams, B-pillars, battery packs, and wheel housing products; chassis systems, including sub-frames, control arms, steering knuckles, and H arms; and smart cockpit components, such as smart drives, side door controllers, power tailgates, and seat pneumatic comfort systems; and thermal management systems comprising distributed heat management pump valves. In addition, it offers air suspension systems, integrated air supply units, and height sensors; and automatic driving systems, including brake systems, electric power steering columns, automotive mechanical steering gears, electronic vacuum pumps, brake vacuum switches, electric wastegate actuators, electronic water and purge pumps, and electronic stability control systems. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Ningbo, China. Ningbo Tuopu Group Co.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of Maike International Holdings (Hong Kong) Co., Ltd.
